critique: This document outlines regulations for the Selective Service, specifically concerning the registration and classification of US citizens residing outside the United States. It establishes procedures for registration, appointment of registrars, and the handling of registration questionnaires. The document also details the creation and jurisdiction of District of Columbia Local Board No. 100 (Foreign) for individuals without a US residence. Furthermore, it covers the classification process, appeals, and amendments to existing Selective Service Regulations, including permits to leave the US and classifications for ROTC members. There is nothing explicitly biased in the document.
